snippet: The famed indie studio was bought for an undisclosed amount by beIN, a company formed in the spinoff of Al Jazeera’s sports unit.
abstract: Miramax is acquired by Qatari company beIN Media Group for undisclosed amount.
lead_paragraph: The famed indie studio was bought for an undisclosed amount by beIN, a company formed in the spinoff of Al Jazeera’s sports unit.

headline.main: Miramax Is Bought by the Qatari beIN Media Group
headline.print_headline: Miramax Is Bought by Company From Qatar
